#### Nested For Loops

```{r}
odds <- c(1, 3, 5)
evens <- c(2, 4, 6, 8)

for (i in seq_along(odds)) {
  for (j in seq_along(evens)) {
    print(odds[i] * evens[j])
  }
}
```

#### Functions

```{r}
exclaim_age <- function(age){
  print(paste("I am", age, "years old!"))
}

exclaim_age(age = 10)
```
